content: इंगित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} Moved, shaken. --तं [भावे-क्त] {@--1@} Palpitation, shaking. {@--2@} Internal thought, inward thought or secret aim, intention, purpose; °आकारवेदिभिः <ls>K. 7</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 43</ls>; अगूढसद्भावमितींगितज्ञया <ls>Ku. 5. 62</ls>; तस्य संवृतमंत्रस्य गूढाकारेंगितस्य च <ls>R. 1. 20</ls>; <ls>Śi. 9. 69.</ls> {@--3@} A hint, sign, gesture; <ls>Pt. 1. 44.</ls> {@--4@} Particularly, the gesture or motion of the various limbs of the body indicating one's intentions; gesture suited to betray internal feelings; आकारैरिंगितैर्गत्या … गृह्यतेंऽतर्गतं मनः <ls>Ms. 8. 26.</ls>
